title: NVIDIA SHIELD - The Console Killer?
description: Nvidia Shield Android TV -   The Nvidia Shield Android TV offers up 4K streaming from your favorite sources like YouTube and Netflix. It also comes with a game controller for use with Android or PC games through the Nvidia GRID system. This could be the best way to stream 4K.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
